column3: Show or hide a specified element.
Move and rotate a specified element.
Adjust the volume of an audio element.
Open a modal; probably a menu window.
Close a modal; probably a menu window.
Set a cookie with a specified name, value, and expiration date.
Get the value of a cookie by name.
Save the volume levels of background audio and sound effects to cookies.
Load the volume levels of background audio and sound effects from cookies.
